name: potatobot
description:
PotatoBot the Discord Bot

To run the bot make token.txt and put in your token and launch runBot.bat

Requires:

  • Windows
  • Node js

Features:

  • modular. You can add your own mods or remove the current ones.
  • economy
    • Stocks
    • Payment between users
  • help command
  • games
    • Pokeman
    • Horse races
